query: query GetTerms($data: TermInput!) { getTerms(data: $data) { terms { id name courseGroups { id name courses { __typename ... on StudioCourse { id name description subtitle price discountedPrice image thumbImage imagePosition { x y } order active displayStatus danceType level attendanceTypes ageFrom ageTo totalSessions duration location instructor startDateTime endDateTime isBookable fullyBooked maxParticipants currentParticipants hasTasterClasses isAcceptingDeposits } ... on OnlineCourse { id name description subtitle price discountedPrice image thumbImage imagePosition { x y } order active displayStatus danceType level attendanceTypes ageFrom ageTo totalSessions duration platform meetingUrl startDateTime endDateTime isBookable fullyBooked maxParticipants currentParticipants hasTasterClasses isAcceptingDeposits } } } } } }
